events.message: The customer reported an auto accident involving their car being rear-ended at a traffic light, requesting immediate claim filing.
The claim was reviewed and categorised under Auto Accident since the reported incident involves a vehicle collision.
A claims agent was assigned to handle the auto accident case and begin the process for further investigation.
The customer received acknowledgement of their claim submission and was informed about the next steps in the process.
The agent requested necessary documentation including the police report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and the customer’s driving license.
The customer submitted all requested documents promptly, including images of the collision damage and the official police report.
An investigation into the auto accident case was initiated to assess liability and extent of vehicle damage.
Investigation concluded confirming that the customer’s vehicle was rear-ended, and liability was assigned to the other driver.
A settlement offer was proposed covering repair costs for the vehicle and compensation for rental car expenses.
The customer responded positively to the settlement offer, appreciating the timely communication and resolution efforts.
The claim was officially approved for payment following customer acceptance of the proposed settlement terms.
Payment was successfully issued to the customer’s bank account to cover all approved repair and rental expenses.
The auto accident claim case was closed following payment distribution and customer confirmation that the issue was resolved.
